languages.text: "Был у нас паренек один неразговорчивый. Однажды заходит он в кабак на средней палубе, пропускает чарочку, а после достает ствол и начинает молча палить во всех подряд. Потом сам дуло в рот вложил и мозги себе расплескал. Вот у коменданта нашего сейчас точь-в-точь взгляд такой же, как у того".

traits.locale_text: "Был у нас паренек один — тихий, без претензий, вообще не возникал никогда. И как-то раз заходит он, как обычно, в кабак, пропускает пару чарочек амасека молча, а после также молча достает ствол и начинает палить во всех подряд. Кучу народу изрешетил, а, когда его все же прижали, сам дуло в рот вложил и пулю скушал. Мне его предсмертный взгляд, дикий такой и отрешенный, словно он не здесь уже давно, на всю жизнь в память врезался. Так вот, у коменданта нашего сейчас точь-в-точь такой же".

languages.text: "You know, we had this guy once, he was a quiet one. One day he walked into a middle deck bar, threw one back, and then pulled out a gun and started shooting people left and right without saying a word. Then he shoved the barrel in his mouth and blew his brains out. Our warden here has exactly the same look in his eyes right now."
languages.original_text: "Был у нас паренек один неразговорчивый. Однажды заходит он в кабак на средней палубе, пропускает чарочку, а после достает ствол и начинает молча палить во всех подряд. Потом сам дуло в рот вложил и мозги себе расплескал. Вот у коменданта нашего сейчас точь-в-точь взгляд такой же, как у того".

traits.locale_text: "You know, we had this guy once, he was a quiet one. One day he walked into a middle deck bar, threw one back, and then pulled out a gun and started shooting people left and right without saying a word. Then he shoved the gun into his mouth and splattered his brains. Our warden here has exactly the same look in his eyes right now."

"You know, we had this guy once, he was a quiet one. One day he walked into a middle deck bar, threw one back, and then pulled out a gun and started shooting people left and right without saying a word. Then he shoved the gun into his mouth and splattered his brains. Our warden here has exactly the same look in his eyes right now."

"You know, we had this guy once, he was a quiet one. One day he walked into a middle deck bar, threw one back, and then pulled out a gun and started shooting people left and right without saying a word. Then he shoved the barrel in his mouth and blew his brains out. Our warden here has exactly the same look in his eyes right now."

"You know, we had this guy once, he was a quiet one. One day he walked into a middle deck bar, threw one back, and then pulled out a gun and started shooting people left and right without saying a word. Then he shoved the barrel in his mouth and blew his brains out. Our warden here has exactly the same look in his eyes right now."

"You know, we had this guy once, he was a quiet one. One day he walked into a middle deck bar, threw one back, and then pulled out a gun and started shooting people left and right without saying a word. Then he shoved the barrel in his mouth and blew his brains out. Our warden here has exactly the same look in his eyes right now."

languages.text: “老实说，我之前认识个人，他是个很安静的家伙。有一天，他走进甲板中层的酒吧里，喝了杯酒，之后掏出枪，一言不发地朝左右两边的人开了枪，之后把枪管塞进自己嘴里，把自己的脑袋打爆了。我们这位典狱长，他现在的眼神就和那个人当时的眼神一模一样。”
languages.original_text: "You know, we had this guy once, he was a quiet one. One day he walked into a middle deck bar, threw one back, and then pulled out a gun and started shooting people left and right without saying a word. Then he shoved the barrel in his mouth and blew his brains out. Our warden here has exactly the same look in his eyes right now."

traits.locale_text: “老实说，我之前认识个人，他是个很安静的家伙。有一天，他走进甲板中层的酒吧里，喝了杯酒，之后掏出枪，一言不发地朝左右两边的人开了枪，之后把枪管塞进自己嘴里，把自己的脑袋打爆了。我们这位典狱长，他现在的眼神就和那个人当时的眼神一模一样。”

languages.text: 「昔、ひとりの男がいたの。静かな男だったわ。ある日、ミドルデッキのバーに入ってきた彼は、一杯飲み干すと銃を取り出し、何も言わずに人々を次々と撃ち始めた。そして銃身を口に押し込み、脳みそを吹き飛ばしたの。ここの所長も、今まさに同じような目をしているわ」
languages.original_text: "You know, we had this guy once, he was a quiet one. One day he walked into a middle deck bar, threw one back, and then pulled out a gun and started shooting people left and right without saying a word. Then he shoved the barrel in his mouth and blew his brains out. Our warden here has exactly the same look in his eyes right now."

traits.locale_text: 「昔、ある男がいた。彼は静かな男だった。ある日、彼はミドルデッキのバーに入ってきて、一人投げ返すと、銃を取り出し、何も言わずに左右の人を撃ち始めた。そして銃身を口に押し込み、脳みそを吹き飛ばしたの。ここの所長も、今まさに同じような目をしているわ」
「昔、ひとりの男がいたの。静かな男だったわ。ある日、ミドルデッキのバーに入ってきた彼は、一杯飲み干すと銃を取り出し、何も言わずに人々を次々と撃ち始めた。そして銃身を口に押し込み、脳みそを吹き飛ばしたの。ここの所長も、今まさに同じような目をしているわ」

languages.text: "Wisst Ihr, wir hatten da mal diesen Typen, ziemlich schweigsam. Eines Tages kam er in eine Bar auf dem mittleren Deck, trank einen und schoss dann auf alle um sich herum, ohne ein Wort zu sagen. Anschließend schob er sich den Lauf in den Mund und blies sich das Gehirn weg. Unser Wächter hier hat gerade genau denselben Ausdruck im Blick."
languages.original_text: "You know, we had this guy once, he was a quiet one. One day he walked into a middle deck bar, threw one back, and then pulled out a gun and started shooting people left and right without saying a word. Then he shoved the barrel in his mouth and blew his brains out. Our warden here has exactly the same look in his eyes right now."

traits.locale_text: "Wisst Ihr, wir hatten da mal diesen Typen, ziemlich schweigsam. Eines Tages kam er in eine Bar auf dem mittleren Deck, trank einen und schoss dann auf alle um sich herum, ohne ein Wort zu sagen. Anschließend schob er sich den Lauf in den Mund und blies sich das Gehirn weg. Unser Wächter hier hat gerade genau denselben Ausdruck im Blick."

languages.text: « Vous savez, j'ai connu un type à l'époque, un homme discret. Un jour, il est entré dans un bar sur un pont intermédiaire, s'est envoyé un verre, puis a sorti une arme et a commencé à tirer sur tout le monde sans rien dire. Ensuite, il s'est enfoncé le canon dans la bouche et s'est fait sauter la cervelle. Notre brave directeur ici présent a exactement le même regard que lui. »
languages.original_text: "You know, we had this guy once, he was a quiet one. One day he walked into a middle deck bar, threw one back, and then pulled out a gun and started shooting people left and right without saying a word. Then he shoved the barrel in his mouth and blew his brains out. Our warden here has exactly the same look in his eyes right now."

traits.locale_text: « Vous savez, j'ai connu un type à l'époque, un homme discret. Un jour, il est entré dans un bar sur un pont intermédiaire, s'est envoyé un verre, puis a sorti une arme et a commencé à tirer sur tout le monde sans rien dire. Ensuite, il s'est enfoncé le canon dans la bouche et s'est fait sauter la cervelle. Notre brave directeur ici présent a exactement le même regard que lui. »

languages.text: «Hace tiempo, teníamos a un tripulante tranquilo en la nave. Un día, se fue a un bar de las cubiertas medias, se tomó una copa, sacó una pistola y empezó a disparar como un poseso sin decir palabra. Después, se la metió en la boca y se voló la cabeza. Este alcaide tiene exactamente la misma mirada que él».
languages.original_text: "You know, we had this guy once, he was a quiet one. One day he walked into a middle deck bar, threw one back, and then pulled out a gun and started shooting people left and right without saying a word. Then he shoved the barrel in his mouth and blew his brains out. Our warden here has exactly the same look in his eyes right now."

Este alcaide tiene exactamente la misma mirada que él».

languages.text: "Hatırlıyorum da bir zamanlar mülayim bir adam vardı yanımızda. Bir gün orta güvertedeki bir bara girdi, bir kadeh dikti, sonra bir silah çıkardı ve tek kelime etmeden millete ateş etmeye başladı. Sonra da namluyu ağzına sokup beynini uçurdu. Buradaki müdürümüzün gözlerinde de şu anda aynı bakış var."
languages.original_text: "You know, we had this guy once, he was a quiet one. Then he shoved the barrel in his mouth and blew his brains out. Our warden here has exactly the same look in his eyes right now."
